title: Design cross-project language version synchronization strategy
description: Design a strategy to synchronize language/runtime versions across dozens of projects in the c:\myStuff workspace. Judge0 serves as the execution engine - all projects should run the same versions. Need: version manifest format, update workflow, CI/CD integration points.

title: Build custom minimal Judge0 Docker image
description: Build a custom minimal Judge0 Docker image (~2-3GB vs 14GB) with only the languages needed for agent workflows: Python, JavaScript/Node.js, TypeScript, Bun, Bash, Go, Ruby, Rust, SQL. All versions updated to latest. This reduces disk footprint while maintaining declarative version control.
close_reason: Created build/ directory with Dockerfile.minimal, versions.json manifest, and README. Added active-minimal-v2.rb with Bun support and updated versions.
